commit message: #5 Created multiple images with varying transparency for the background.

#26 Fixed problem where an all day event is displayed one day earlier.

The problem was related to the timezone of the event.
Updated versionName to 1.4 and versionCode to 8.
#5 100% transparency now means bg is transparent, 0% is opaque.
#26 Fixed problem with allday event and different timezone.

#27 Fixed edge case where a list entry would be requested with wrong
index.
#26 Introduced joda time to fix all-day event problems with timezones.
